about_the_game:
A hardcore, open world FPS that takes place in a dense & detailed post apocalyptic New York City. Inspired by several other survival games, Nysunder aims to deliver a truly dynamic apocalyptic experience, that changes with every character. You take the role of an unvoiced protagonist, where it is your job to carve your mark in the world, from a starving transient, a blood thirsty cannibal, or simply a lone wonderer. The choice is yours.


INTENSE GAMEPLAY
There's an abundance of valuable gear & loot inside the many detailed interiors scattered throughout our world. Hack & Slash through hordes of infected in a plethora of unique locations to secure equipment. Though, the odds of making it out unscathed are low. Plan your routes & sneak around your enemies to perform stealth takedowns, or go in guns blazing.


DIVERSE ARSENAL
Destroy your enemies with a large customizable arsenal of unique weapons. Complete with; jamming, modular parts, checkable magazines&chamber, tactical reloads, simulated ballistics, conditions, and much more.


DARK & GRITTY WORLD
Our depiction of NYC, is gruesome. Corpses line the abandoned streets, sick and twisted individuals hide amongst the many dark interiors, the stench of burning bodies filling the air, there are no holds barred. The apocalypse is a disgusting place, and so is the world of Nysunder.


SURROUNDING AREAS
Don't feel like dealing with the chaotic action in the city? No sweat! We've created the surrounding outskirts of NY, that include several different farms, tree-lines, rural shops & houses + much more.


FLEXIBLE BUILD SYSTEM
Base building in Nysunder is tailored to suit several different playstyles. You can create a primitive settlement from scratch, fortify an old house, pitch a tent, or simply live in an RV. Feel like powering your homestead? The game features a fleshed out electricity system with a usable wire tool, where you can link up lights, generators, solar panels, etc.

A hardcore, open world FPS that takes place in a dense & detailed post apocalyptic New York City. Inspired by several other survival games, Nysunder aims to deliver a truly dynamic apocalyptic experience, that changes with every character. You take the role of an unvoiced protagonist, where it is your job to carve your mark in the world, from a starving transient, a blood thirsty cannibal, or simply a lone wonderer. The choice is yours.


INTENSE GAMEPLAY
There's an abundance of valuable gear & loot inside the many detailed interiors scattered throughout our world. Hack & Slash through hordes of infected in a plethora of unique locations to secure equipment. Though, the odds of making it out unscathed are low. Plan your routes & sneak around your enemies to perform stealth takedowns, or go in guns blazing.


DIVERSE ARSENAL
Destroy your enemies with a large customizable arsenal of unique weapons. Complete with; jamming, modular parts, checkable magazines&chamber, tactical reloads, simulated ballistics, conditions, and much more.


DARK & GRITTY WORLD
Our depiction of NYC, is gruesome. Corpses line the abandoned streets, sick and twisted individuals hide amongst the many dark interiors, the stench of burning bodies filling the air, there are no holds barred. The apocalypse is a disgusting place, and so is the world of Nysunder.

Base building in Nysunder is tailored to suit several different playstyles. You can create a primitive settlement from scratch, fortify an old house, pitch a tent, or simply live in an RV. Feel like powering your homestead? The game features a fleshed out electricity system with a usable wire tool, where you can link up lights, generators, solar panels, etc.
legal_notice: Any & all logos, names, places or icons present in our products that are similar to those in the real world are purely a coincidence and or a work of fiction.
name: Nysunder

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: i5 2500k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Gtx 1050ti 4GB
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible sound card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: We haven't experimented much with sound cards.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: I7 7700k
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX570 8GB
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible sound card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: We haven't experimented much with sound cards.

short_description: Nysunder is a true hardcore, open world, FPS. It brings realistic gunplay mechanics & in-depth survival features into one package, to create intense combat. Leave your mark in the world by joining several unique factions, or simply go off-grid with your camper van. The choice is yours!
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
